marklogic.body: Looks like Osbornes performance today may have landed Dave with his own Romney style tax problem. John Rentoul ‏ @JohnRentoul RT @paulwaugh PM's spksman on Cameron & 50p tax: "Tax is a private matter between ministers and HMRC" >> Except for Osborne on Today this am Paul Waugh‏ @paulwaugh Follow If he were a US politician, the PM wd have to Cough on his tax status. Is Sunlight only 'the best disinfectant' *in America*? Chris Ship ‏ @chrisshipitvClose PM on his TOTAL income: Budget not about me or individuals. I cut my own salary by 5% & froze it for Parliament. All my interests r declared
